channel.title: REPOST: 562 Help Needed
channel.description: Hello, I've got a 562 HD source client (Painzone) and I'd like to make it so when you die you lose items and make it you when you drop an item it doesnt disappear, and I've been trying to change the item bonuses for a while and can't figure it out.

item.title: REPOST: 562 Help Needed
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

The only way I found to make drops work was the castle wars arena dangerous area. I have yet to implement that into the actual pvp.

On my 562, when you drop something, it does appear.

Item bonuses are in your itemdefinitions.CFG in the data folder. Once you change the the CFG delete your itemdefinitions.BIN file and restart your server. This will remake the .bin and use the new values.

Read full topic

item.title: REPOST: 562 Help Needed
